casebody.data:
MUNN
v.
NC STATE UNIVERSITY. No. 567A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. John P. Scherer, II, Kimberly D. Potter, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. State University. Michael L. Unti, Sharon Smith, for Harry E. Munn, Jr.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of January 2006 by Defendant to Amend Defendant Appellant's New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
